abilities.description: Enel can fire massive beams of lightning from the sky to strike targets anywhere in his range, completely obliterating them.
Combined with Mantra (Observation Haki), Enel can monitor everything happening across Skypiea by listening to electromagnetic signals.

keyMoments.title: Enel's Lightning Power Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Enel demonstrates his Goro Goro no Mi ability by firing a massive lightning beam from the sky that completely disintegrates an illegal treasure hunter in Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Enel's devastating Logia-type Devil Fruit power, establishing him as an extremely dangerous antagonist.

reveals.information: Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows user to create, control, and transform into lightning
Can fire devastating lightning strikes from great distances with pinpoint accuracy
